page.title: 10Employment
page.content: Although the national unemployment rate is high,this area does not follow the trend.From our sample 175 families only 2 fathers are without work.As this is in the commuter belt about half the men work more than 10 miles away from home.63% of the mothers work but mostly within a 3 miles radius. About 70% of all workers go to work by car,17% are within walking distance, nearly 13% travel by public transport while 2 people regularly cycle. A high proportion of men hold managerial,executive and professional posts or are skilled artisans.Only 16 in our survey are engaged in the traditional furniture trade and one in the once prosperous High Wycombe based paper-making industry. The women are mainly in clerical or retail work or are teachers,nurses,home helps,supervisors or kitchen workers.
